ChangeBaseDomainWarningDscr: Changing the domain name may cause some systems failure. After changing the domain name you will need to reconfigure the following settings: mail, account, jabber parameters.
ConfigureCurrentPortalMessage: You need to connect your domain to your current IP to change the address settings. Please make sure you have access to the domain settings to be able to do that. After connecting the domain, create a portal name. You can change the created portal name later using the portal settings.
ErrorPortalNameExist: Portal name is already in use
ErrorPortalNameTooLong: Portal name exceeds limitation of 100 characters
MultiPortalstDscr: Use this section to create several portals making them accessible for your users.
NewPortalPanelMessage: You have successfully connected your domain to your IP address. To edit the portal address settings you need to set the future portal name.
